itemSelector.title: Bannière accueil
itemSelector.content:
<?xml version="1.0"?>

<root available-locales="fr_FR" default-locale="fr_FR" version="1.0">
	<dynamic-element field-reference="linkLabelFieldSet" index-type="" instance-id="Nmqysvkh" name="linkLabelFieldSet" type="fieldset">
		<dynamic-element field-reference="linkLabel" index-type="none" instance-id="swjy" name="linkLabel" type="text">
			<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[Nous rejoindre]]></dynamic-content>
		</dynamic-element>
		<dynamic-element field-reference="linkURL" index-type="none" instance-id="kndt" name="linkURL" type="link_to_layout">
			<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[{"groupId":976405,"name":"Pages Publiques > Ville & Eurométropole > Travailler à l'Eurométropole > Offres d'emploi, de stage et d'apprentissage","id":"69299583-b613-74c7-e620-673c6348a617","privateLayout":false,"value":"/offres-emploi-stage-apprentissage","layoutId":"1552"}]]></dynamic-content>
		</dynamic-element>
		<dynamic-element field-reference="DescriptionText" index-type="keyword" instance-id="dN5G6V43" name="Text79643664" type="text">
			<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[L'Eurométropole de Strasbourg recrute régulièrement. Rejoignez-nous !]]></dynamic-content>
		</dynamic-element>
		<dynamic-element field-reference="externalLinkFieldSet" index-type="" instance-id="AW6pp8Um" name="externalLinkFieldSet" type="fieldset">
			<dynamic-element field-reference="externalLink" index-type="keyword" instance-id="zfah" name="externalLink" type="text">
				<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[]]></dynamic-content>
			</dynamic-element>
			<dynamic-element field-reference="activeTab" index-type="keyword" instance-id="ncbk" name="activeTab" type="checkbox">
				<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[false]]></dynamic-content>
			</dynamic-element>
		</dynamic-element>
	</dynamic-element>
	<dynamic-element field-reference="linkLabelFieldSet" index-type="" instance-id="7Oj8nEuu" name="linkLabelFieldSet" type="fieldset">
		<dynamic-element field-reference="linkLabel" index-type="none" instance-id="malz" name="linkLabel" type="text">
			<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[Démarches]]></dynamic-content>
		</dynamic-element>
		<dynamic-element field-reference="linkURL" index-type="none" instance-id="gjbb" name="linkURL" type="link_to_layout">
			<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[{}]]></dynamic-content>
		</dynamic-element>
		<dynamic-element field-reference="DescriptionText" index-type="keyword" instance-id="RVPSwIdi" name="Text79643664" type="text">
			<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[Retrouvez toutes vos démarches du quotidien en un seul clic.]]></dynamic-content>
		</dynamic-element>
		<dynamic-element field-reference="externalLinkFieldSet" index-type="" instance-id="43ZDADoO" name="externalLinkFieldSet" type="fieldset">
			<dynamic-element field-reference="externalLink" index-type="keyword" instance-id="fbpc" name="externalLink" type="text">
				<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[https://portail-strasbourg.test.entrouvert.org/]]></dynamic-content>
			</dynamic-element>
			<dynamic-element field-reference="activeTab" index-type="keyword" instance-id="mcws" name="activeTab" type="checkbox">
				<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[false]]></dynamic-content>
			</dynamic-element>
		</dynamic-element>
	</dynamic-element>
	<dynamic-element field-reference="linkLabelFieldSet" index-type="" instance-id="NMfyYgtQ" name="linkLabelFieldSet" type="fieldset">
		<dynamic-element field-reference="linkLabel" index-type="none" instance-id="qrxsnoiz" name="linkLabel" type="text">
			<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[Lire notre monde]]></dynamic-content>
		</dynamic-element>
		<dynamic-element field-reference="linkURL" index-type="none" instance-id="xjwtpsrr" name="linkURL" type="link_to_layout">
			<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[{}]]></dynamic-content>
		</dynamic-element>
		<dynamic-element field-reference="DescriptionText" index-type="keyword" instance-id="KfA3jfUL" name="Text79643664" type="text">
			<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[Strasbourg a été désignée capitale mondiale du livre 2024 !!]]></dynamic-content>
		</dynamic-element>
		<dynamic-element field-reference="externalLinkFieldSet" index-type="" instance-id="KIae77eK" name="externalLinkFieldSet" type="fieldset">
			<dynamic-element field-reference="externalLink" index-type="keyword" instance-id="wnlefuky" name="externalLink" type="text">
				<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[https://lirenotremonde.strasbourg.eu/]]></dynamic-content>
			</dynamic-element>
			<dynamic-element field-reference="activeTab" index-type="keyword" instance-id="cineware" name="activeTab" type="checkbox">
				<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[false]]></dynamic-content>
			</dynamic-element>
		</dynamic-element>
	</dynamic-element>
	<dynamic-element field-reference="linkLabelFieldSet" index-type="" instance-id="OCafMXjS" name="linkLabelFieldSet" type="fieldset">
		<dynamic-element field-reference="linkLabel" index-type="none" instance-id="oslvmtyb" name="linkLabel" type="text">
			<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[Agenda]]></dynamic-content>
		</dynamic-element>
		<dynamic-element field-reference="linkURL" index-type="none" instance-id="xyalicpy" name="linkURL" type="link_to_layout">
			<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[{"groupId":976405,"name":"Pages Publiques > L'Actu > Agenda","id":"ee22d0f1-3963-28c9-6e16-d36243d53c31","privateLayout":false,"value":"/agenda","layoutId":"994"}]]></dynamic-content>
		</dynamic-element>
		<dynamic-element field-reference="DescriptionText" index-type="keyword" instance-id="qdxiDmbI" name="Text79643664" type="text">
			<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[Sortir à Strasbourg : agenda des évènements culturels, économiques, festifs, pédagogiques, scientifiques, sportifs...]]></dynamic-content>
		</dynamic-element>
		<dynamic-element field-reference="externalLinkFieldSet" index-type="" instance-id="fP74b4SE" name="externalLinkFieldSet" type="fieldset">
			<dynamic-element field-reference="externalLink" index-type="keyword" instance-id="wionbrfa" name="externalLink" type="text">
				<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[]]></dynamic-content>
			</dynamic-element>
			<dynamic-element field-reference="activeTab" index-type="keyword" instance-id="esxhessq" name="activeTab" type="checkbox">
				<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[false]]></dynamic-content>
			</dynamic-element>
		</dynamic-element>
	</dynamic-element>
	<dynamic-element field-reference="linkLabelFieldSet" index-type="" instance-id="Wo6oQcoo" name="linkLabelFieldSet" type="fieldset">
		<dynamic-element field-reference="linkLabel" index-type="none" instance-id="owynhdge" name="linkLabel" type="text">
			<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[StrasApp]]></dynamic-content>
		</dynamic-element>
		<dynamic-element field-reference="linkURL" index-type="none" instance-id="sredrjgd" name="linkURL" type="link_to_layout">
			<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[{}]]></dynamic-content>
		</dynamic-element>
		<dynamic-element field-reference="DescriptionText" index-type="keyword" instance-id="ibgJEGCU" name="Text79643664" type="text">
			<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[Toute l'Eurométropole de Strasbourg dans une appli]]></dynamic-content>
		</dynamic-element>
		<dynamic-element field-reference="externalLinkFieldSet" index-type="" instance-id="zxgt8BMu" name="externalLinkFieldSet" type="fieldset">
			<dynamic-element field-reference="externalLink" index-type="keyword" instance-id="lautereg" name="externalLink" type="text">
				<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[https://strasapp.eu/]]></dynamic-content>
			</dynamic-element>
			<dynamic-element field-reference="activeTab" index-type="keyword" instance-id="nnjdvzmi" name="activeTab" type="checkbox">
				<dynamic-content language-id="fr_FR"><![CDATA[false]]></dynamic-content>
			</dynamic-element>
		</dynamic-element>
	</dynamic-element>
</root>

widgetConfig.emailAssetEntryAddedBody_fr_FR:
Dear [$TO_NAME$],

This is an autogenerated email for the [$PORTLET_NAME$] portlet.

The following asset entries have been added to [$PORTLET_TITLE$]: [$ASSET_ENTRIES$].

Sincerely,
[$FROM_NAME$]
[$FROM_ADDRESS$]

Dear [$TO_NAME$],

This is an autogenerated email for the [$PORTLET_NAME$] portlet.

The following asset entries have been added to [$PORTLET_TITLE$]: [$ASSET_ENTRIES$].

Sincerely,
[$FROM_NAME$]
[$FROM_ADDRESS$]
